description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard... (about 11 lines of text, just give us the description)
full_summary:
### Tokyo Asian-Pacific Region Contract Opportunity

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4006796409
* **Reference Number**: WS4006796409-Doc4058303724
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: June 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: July 14, 2023
* **Contract Start Date**: May 19, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: December 1, 2031

#### Service Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking industry feedback to inform the type, nature, and combination of services for a contract to provide property management, project delivery, and optional services for the Tokyo Mission. This contract may also be used as a baseline model for other international jurisdictions.

#### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Marie-Ève Bouchard (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16609396?extsite=MTY2MDkzOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16609396?extsite=MTY2MDkzOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Submission Guidelines

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and answers must be submitted by Friday, July 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Canada will not reimburse any respondent for expenses incurred in responding to this Request for Information (RFI).
